text.content: This app was designed to help you during the COVID-19 pandemic and beyond.
It can help you manage stress, track your mood, and find resources.
This app is not a replacement for treatment by a professional.
The Manage Stress section provides concrete tips, strategies, and tools for dealing with stress and finding ways to cope with challenges.
The Learn section has important information to help you stay safe and healthy during the COVID-19 pandemic and beyond.
Use the Mood Check section to track goals, check in on your mood and well-being, and visualize your progress.
Use the Find Resources section to get connected with a wide range of services and supports to help you meet your needs during the pandemic.
Set Reminders to check out the app and take a few minutes for yourself and your well-being.
